txt.en: A notice is pinned to the board, signed by Ingold:\n\n'We have detected a large presence of Olog-hai at Fushaum Tûm, and believe the leaders are planning an attack. A brave adventurer is needed to infiltrate the camp and defeat these powerful foes.'
'The encampment of Fushaum Tûm concerns me. There seems to be a large presence of Olog-hai there. I ask you to find those in command at Fushaum Tûm and defeat them.'
Defeat Shatúrro, the Spear and Thorakó, the Hewer.
Ingold has asked you to defeat the leaders of Fushaum Tûm.
With the defeat of Shatúrro, the Spear and Thorakó, the Hewer, the encampment of Fushaum Tum has been plunged into chaos.
Ingold, a soldier of Gondor, has scouted Dor Amarth and is concerned with the growing numbers of foes gathering at the encampment of Fushaum Tûm.
